text: Smrečje v Črni () is small settlement under the Črnivec Pass in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Smrečje to Smrečje v Črni in 1953.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==References== ==External links== *Smrečje v Črni at Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Smrečje v Črni
